title: katarina needs buffs, she is simply unplayable.
body:
Katarina is very bad in this meta and need buffs

you can't do aything because tanks and bruisers with tons of cc rule the fields and interrupt all your stuff

we need to increase katarina e shunpo dmg reduction and range and increase range of w ty

replies.body: 51% win rate says otherwise. She is fine.
51 is not good

Your mom isn't good and we don't go around crying for her, I'm actually glad ppl don't pick {{champion:55}}, that champion is dumb, u can shit on her soul the whole game and all she needs is 1 or 2 kills to start steamrolling all over you...

so funny haha

silver 4 complaining about weak champs like katarina, not suprised
>I'm bad with her so she's not good
ur bad

> [{quoted}](name=ggplayer12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5bNbef2T,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-08-08T20:46:00.573+0000)
>
> ur bad

http://champion.gg/champion/Katarina

that winrate with that playrate actually means shes fairly strong right now. i dont think she needs nerfs, but no buffs either.

shes fine.
You mean {{champion:268}}
azir is fucking disgusting he needs nerfs

> [{quoted}](name=ggplayer12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5bNbef2T,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-08-08T21:37:00.659+0000)
>
> azir is fucking disgusting he needs nerfs

Hahaha.Azir isn't strong at least meanwhile Katarina is so strong.
play more than bot games before you discuss balance

> [{quoted}](name=ggplayer12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5bNbef2T,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-08T22:38:16.654+0000)
>
> play more than bot games before you discuss balance

Don't cry salty.A champion is disgusting so he needs nerfs? Absurd thread, absurd answers.

yes azir needs to be gutted

why are you even posting on gameplay, all you do is play irelia and jhin on bot games you have no concept of balance

> [{quoted}](name=ggplayer12,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5bNbef2T,comment-id=000800000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-08T22:43:00.131+0000)
>
> yes azir needs to be gutted
> 
> why are you even posting on gameplay, all you do is play irelia and jhin on bot games you have no concept of balance

So Katarina needs more nerf.Like your anwers.

well i main kata but its very hard to play it 
kata is not a good champ to 1v1 at mid i can say but she  neeed kills somewhere else
kata need a double kill at botlane to carry the game(this is what i do)
 thresh or blitz or kind of  these supp,,,they ez cancel ur ult and  this is not good
and kata is useless vs tanks like poppy garennnn 
and yes i think as katarina need a buff {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Are you being serious? Your win-rate with Kat is insane. Mine is much lower and I do think she is in a decent place. I guess I do have 4 times your amount of games but still. 

Katarina is a champion that is as good as your game knowledge is. The more you know about the game, the better your timings are, and the better you will do.
51% win-rate mid lane atm
ur point?
That you're wrong.
i gotta say your commitment to the shitpost is admirable
Kat has and always will be a pub stomper. In low elo when people dont save their cc for her she can go on massive tears. I'm still a bit of a noob but i learnt that one very quickly.

ok so then low elo should learn to save cc

champs shouldn't be left in gutter just because certain low elo people don't know how to play around them

But that is what low elo is for. Learning. I could list at least a ton of champs that are good on low elo but rubbish on high elo. You know why its balanced like that? because bronze and silver make up 70% of ranked players.
how come they don't get to higher ranks then?
Oh, idk. Maybe just maybe its because they aren't really good at the game. Who would have guessed.
this game is so ez how can you not be good
Being bad in X meta doesn't mean that champion is weak.
it does
Are you just wanting someone to point out that you have over 80% win rate with Kat after 73 ranked games on your gold smurf? Cuz...that's really good brah.

You seem to have placed this in Gameplay and not memes dude.
I'd get that changed :^)

nice joke kid

you abused tanks to plat, you are probably silver

Wasn't a joke, I was being 100% super cereal.

Yeah you got me. I'm secretly a bronze.
don't tell anyone :v(
no she doesnt
-Deal with it.
A fed Kat is one of the most obnoxious things in a LOL game. If anything she needs nerfs.
